name: PONG KONG FUFU
description:
PONG KONG FUFU is a Pong's remake, made during one week++ mini LDJAM 58 event. The game gets a weird new gameplay, as you can play alone or 2 players without any menu switch. How can we make a brand new game more exciting than a 50 years old mythic one ? By adding explosions, smooth visuals, schizo gameplay, multiballs, vilains, different levels,mix it with arkanoid and snake, even a story,shake and TADAM !

WTF ?? PONGKONGFUFU'CKED !
